Package com.lambdaschool.foundation.handlers

Class RestExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • com.lambdaschool.foundation.handlers.RestExceptionHandler
  • @Order(-2147483648)
@RestControllerAdvice
public class RestExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    This is the driving class when an exception occurs. All exceptions are handled here. This class is shared across all controllers due to the annotation RestControllerAdvice; this class gives advice to all controllers on how to handle exceptions. Due to the annotation Order(Ordered.HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE), this class takes precedence over all other controller advisors.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler

        logger, PAGE_NOT_FOUND_LOG_CATEGORY, pageNotFoundLogger

    • Method Detail

      • handleResourceNotFoundException

        @ExceptionHandler(ResourceNotFoundException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleResourceNotFoundException​(ResourceNotFoundException rnfe)
        Our custom handling of ResourceNotFoundExceptions. This gets thrown manually by our application.
        Parameters:
        rnfe - All the information about the exception that is thrown.
        Returns:
        The error details for displaying to the client plus the status Not Found.
